name: Underwriters Laboratories AG
membership: International Federation of Inspection Agencies (IFIA), International Confederation of Inspection and Certification Organisations (CEOC), Confederation of British Industry (CBI)
goal: Around the globe, UL works to help customers, purchasers and policymakers navigate market risk and complexity. UL builds trust in the safety, security and sustainability of products, organizations, and supply chains – enabling smarter choices and better lives. In all we do, we apply science and expertise to enable the responsible design, production, marketing and purchase of the goods, solutions and innovations of today and tomorrow.
interests: Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Trade
euInitiatives: Consumer product safety, market surveillance, cyber security certification, circular economy, internal market, trade negotiations
